name: Callstack Engineers
fullText:
We'll be live on Thursday to dive into Vega OS and React Native!

Join us to see how to set up the tools and build your first app! 🤞

name: HashKey Group
fullText:
💬 “With stablecoins, you can transact 24/7 — a clear example of how they can be capital efficient by leveraging an always-on rail to reduce the cost of capital.”

— Catherine Gu @catgu_, Head of Institutional Client Solutions at @Visa, speaking at our PayFi & Stablecoin Panel https://t.co/08mIFnfDhE

name: Mr.RC｜𝟎𝐱𝐔
fullText:
【Bitget钱包 天团周记 2️⃣】

实在是非常几把抽象的一周

怎么个抽象法呢？
1. 奶奶的交易次数比上个礼拜少，但赚的比上个礼拜多
2. @kajiweb3 一开始办这个活动是让我们打狗的，是让我们打狗的没错，但是我基本都在打launchpad，而且效果还不错。、

听我娓娓道来： https://t.co/jL2980V7Re

name: HashKey Group
fullText:

She also highlighted that HashKey created the new Marketplace feature— moving away from https://t.co/akKIUXl9F4
